feed.title: Code for Boulder
feed.subtitle: Enabling community members to collaboratively solve local problems with technology. We are community organizers, subject-matter experts, designers, technologists, UX/UI experts, interested residents, and more who are working for a better Boulder, a better America and a better tomorrow. We are the Boulder brigade of Code for America, a non-partisan, non-political organization working to create low-risk settings for innovation between citizens and government.
